name: Deft Shootist Deed

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Grit class feature or Amateur Gunslinger feat, Dodge, Mobility.

sections.body: As long as you have at least 1 grit point, you do not provoke attacks of opportunity when shooting or reloading a firearm.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You keep an eye out while focusing on your weapon, allowing you to avoid attacks while shooting and reloading firearms.
